com.chrismin13.additionsapi.durability

Class ShieldDurability

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chrismin13.additionsapi.durability.ItemDurability
      • com.chrismin13.additionsapi.durability.ShieldDurability

  • public class ShieldDurability
extends ItemDurability
    This specifies how a shield will have its durability reduced when performing certain actions. Default values are set up exactly like in vanilla Minecraft.
    BlockBreak defaults to 0
    EntityHit defautls to 0
    The sheild will be damaged as much as the damage that the player blocking received
    There are extra durability points taken when blocking a hit, default is 1
    There is a damage multiplier, it defaults to 1F
    Author:
    chrismin13

      • getDamageMultiplier

        public float getDamageMultiplier()
        If the shield is blocking when the player takes damage by another entity, the amount of durability reduced by the shield will be however much the damage taken was. This multiplier determines how much the durability will be decreased or increased.

      • setDamageMultiplier

        public ShieldDurability setDamageMultiplier(float damageMultiplier)
        If the shield is blocking when the player takes damage by another entity, the amount of durability reduced by the shield will be however much the damage taken was. This multiplier determines how much the durability will be decreased or increased.
        Parameters:
        damageMultiplier -
